data.message: You have a amazing rap talent but did you know your both names slim shady and Eminem were made in the 80s from teenagers who wanted to be rappers but never had the talent but was so big on ideas they could take over the world from there bedrooms teenage megalomaniacs I think they tried to hard and the cost were there mental health issues if it for it for you it’s no good being a thinking farm for the illuminati then your a slave to music I have been there and done it and all these teenagers growing up now don’t even realise what’s ahead of them just look at the British news a 150 school children refuse therapy everyday buliding issues for them in later life
